name: Mambo The Kitten
description: Mambo The Kitten is a community token inspired by a real kitten named Mambo, born 25 August 2025. Her name comes from the M marking on her head, being our fifth kitten (Mambo No.5), and her two Rambo-like war stripes. The token, launched on her 2-month birthday, explores the Kaspa ecosystem through creativity, transparency, and community rewards for loyal subscribers and supporters.

policy.minting: Subscriber-based expansion with proportional airdrops and matching liquidity injections.
policy.burns: Occasional milestone burns to maintain scarcity and reward holders.
policy.liquidity: Added gradually in sync with community growth.
